alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 4:48PM EDT until July 15 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Lake County in northeastern Ohio... Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 448 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Perry to 6 miles south of Madison to 7 miles northwest of Orwell, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Orwell, Andover, Austinburg, Montville, Kingsville, Hartsgrove, Roaming Shores, Pierpont, Cherry Valley, North Perry, Thompson, Rock Creek and Edgewood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
